item.title: The Graph Laplacian & Semi-Supervised Clustering
item.description: In this post we want to explore the semi-supervided algorithm presented Eldad Haber in the BMS Summer School 2019: Mathematics of Deep Learning, during 19 - 30 August 2019, at the Zuse Institute Berlin. He developed an implementation in Matlab which you can find in this GitHub repository. In addition, please find the corresponding slides here. Prepare Notebook import numpy as np import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import seaborn as sns; sns.
